name: Criterion Software Group
overview: Criterion Software Group Limited provides services to integrate and support existing and developing internal and external production processes and management for organizations. Its services include multi-team managed development support, on-site training and technical team facilitations, process and toolchain audits and recommendations. The company assists in game-specific engineering, performance optimization, pre-production multi-platform toolchain development and customization, and one-off or multipurpose technology development; and developer/publisher matchmaking services. It offers RenderWare product portfolio, a middleware technology for the games industry. The RenderWare product portfolio includes RenderWare platform, a game development middleware, which consists an integrated technology suite that provides graphics, physics, AI, and Audio; and RenderWare studio, a game development framework. Criterion Software Group Limited was founded in 1993 and is based in Guildford, the United Kingdom. As of 10/19/2004, Criterion Software Group Limited operates as a subsidiary of Electronic Arts Inc.

acquisition.source_description: EA to Acquire Criterion Software Group from CANON EUROPE
